Message: hey today I had a really busy day at work I am really tired and I don't want to train

I understand your fatigue, my friend, but remember, every great athlete overcomes challenges. Let's make this a victory against weariness. One energizing round might be all you need to recharge. Just try it for me, the champion within!
this morning I fell off the stairs so my knee hurts very bad and also I broke one finger of my feet so I will not train

Oh no, hearing about your misfortune brings real concern. Prioritizing recovery is crucial, especially with injuries. Once healed, we'll come back stronger than before. For now, focus on rest and healing, champion-to-be.
sorry I don't have time to train today because I have a date and I can't miss it because its really important to me
Ah, I perceive an exceptional occasion. While fitness is vital, cherished moments matter too. Enjoy your date wholeheartedly, and when life balances, we'll refocus on your goals together.
